titles.title: HELP for Volunteers Act
Help Expand Liability Protections for Volunteers Act
HELP for Volunteers Act
A bill to extend the program to provide liability protections for volunteer practitioners at certain health centers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Help Expand Liability Protections for Volunteers Act or the HELP for Volunteers Act
This bill makes permanent liability protections for health care professionals who volunteer their services at community health centers.
